product_name: GU Roctane Ultra Endurance Energy Drink - 12 Servings
long_description: The GU Roctane Ultra Endurance energy drink mix supplies the carbs and replenishes the electrolytes that are crucial for sustained, high-intensity exercise. Carbohydrate-dense Roctane offers taurine, caffeine, beta alanine and a blend of amino acids to help enhance your performance and meet your most ambitious athletic goals. Light and great-tasting formula is easy to mix for quick fueling, hour after hour. 2 scoops offer 240 calories and makes 21 fl. oz.; drink at least 20 - 30 fl. oz. per hour depending on conditions and the intensity and duration of your activity. For optimum results, use the GU Roctane Ultra Endurance energy drink mix along with 1 or 2 packets of Roctane energy gel per hour (gel packets sold separately). *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The GU Roctane Ultra Endurance energy drink mix supplies the carbs and replenishes the electrolytes that are crucial for sustained, high-intensity exercise.
